pages.text: While Carcasses are powerful tools for damaging The Source, they can prove to be ineffective in the later stages of infection. The Scorned Pearl can be used to substantially increase their effectiveness, guaranteeing the Hive will be set back by several Phases if used properly by frying Source linkages in a large radius.

The Scorned Pearl requires complete darkness to be used, and it cannot be used during a global cooldown. Holding it in the offhand while using a Carcass will consume the item, reducing the Evolution Phase and severely damaging parasites in a 10 chunk radius.$(br)Parasites within 5 chunks of the blast will have their ability to adapt to damage sources completely disabled, and within half that distance they will be stunned as well.
